post.title: can't get progressive output to avr
post.content: when connecting my "early 2008" mac pro to my new denon 3808ci avr, i can only get interlaced output for most resolutions from the mac's nvidia 8800 gt graphics card. i have posted this issue on the avr forum here: http://www.avsforum.com/avs-vb/showt...2#post13165042 and also on apple's forum here: http://discussions.apple.com/thread....04562tstart=0 connecting the mac directly to my projector results in normal operation. any help appreciated.
